PerfectNetExp.abs: syllabi 判决书syllabic 音节主音syllabically 每音节地
Describe the development of syllabic writing systems from pictographic system ., 描述一下从图画系统到音节书写的发展过程.
1.音节式(syllabic): 歌词一音节对应一个音符;2.音团式(neumatic): 每一音节对应一个Neume;3.花腔式(mellismatic): 每一音节对应多.
英语派生词常用词缀 - 豆丁网 ... polycentric( 多中心的) syllabic( [语]音节主音，音节的]- polysyllabic( 多音节的).

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French syllabique or late Latin syllabicus, from Greek sullabikos, from sullabē 'syllable'

means.word_mean: 2. consisting of or using a syllabary or syllabic characters;

sentences.sentence: "eskimos of the eastern Arctic have a system of syllabic writing"

means.word_mean: 3. (of verse) having lines based on number of syllables rather than on rhythmical arrangement of stresses or quantities

4. consisting of a syllable or syllables; constituting a syllable or the nucleus of a syllable; consisting of a consonant sound not accompanied in the same syllable by a vowel sound or consisting of a vowel sound dominating the other vowel sounds in a syll

sentences.sentence: "the syllabic `l' in `riddle' or the syllabic `n' in `botany' when it is pronounced `bot-n-y'"
